text: "Our industry has a really horrible problem with zombie workloads. This is stuff that is running but does not have any value. " -- @holly_cummins, IBM #KubeCon #KubeConEU #K8s #CloudNative #KubeCon2020 https://t.co/hgvNbMQXMJ
